title: Hit Me Like a Man - EP

tracks.title: Make Me Wanna Die
lyrics: [Verse 1: Taylor Momsen]
Take me, I'm alive
Never was a girl with a wicked mind
But everything looks better when the sun goes down
[Verse 2: Taylor Momsen]
I had everything
Opportunities for eternity
And I could belong to the night
[Pre-Chorus: Taylor Momsen]
Your eyes, your eyes
I can see in your eyes, your eyes
[Chorus: Taylor Momsen]
You make me wanna die
I'll never be good enough
You make me wanna die
And everything you love
Will burn up in the light
And every time I look inside your eyes
You make me wanna die
[Verse 3: Taylor Momsen]
Taste me, drink my soul
Show me all the things that I shouldn't know
When there's a blue moon on the rise
[Verse 2: Taylor Momsen]
I had everything
Opportunities for eternity
And I could belong to the night
[Pre-Chorus: Taylor Momsen]
Your eyes, your eyes
I can see in your eyes, your eyes
Everything in your eyes, your eyes
[Chorus: Taylor Momsen]
You make me wanna die
I'll never be good enough
You make me wanna die
And everything you love
Will burn up in the light
Every time I look inside your eyes (I'm burning in the light)
You make me wanna die
[Bridge: Taylor Momsen, Ben Phillips]
I would die for you, my love, my love
I would lie for you, my love, my love (You make me wanna die)
And I would steal for you, my love, my love (You make me wanna die)
I would die for you, my love, my love
[Outro: Taylor Momsen, Ben Phillips, Taylor Momsen & Ben Phillips]
We'll burn up in the light
Every time I look inside your eyes (I'm burning in the light)
Look inside your eyes (I'm burning in the light)
I look inside your eyes
You make me wanna die

tracks.title: Hit Me Like a Man
lyrics: [Intro]
Ow!
[Verse 1]
I am strong, love is evil
It's a version of perversion that is only for the lucky people
Take your time and do with me what you will, I won't mind
You know I'm ill, you know I'm ill
[Chorus 1]
So hit me like a man, and love me like a woman
Buried inside, look me in the eyes, I want it
One will give you hell, one will give you heaven
Hit me like a man, love me like a woman
Love me like a woman
[Verse 2]
Love is strong, but I am evil
You are wrong about me
Take your time, I'll play with me until
You can hear the children scream, like they're stuck inside a dream
Then you'll know I will
[Chorus 2]
So hit me like a man, love me like a woman
Bury me alive, I can see it in your eyes, you want it
Some will give you pain, some will give you pleasure
Hit me like a man, love me like a woman
Love me like a woman
[Bridge]
Don't you run away, run away from me
I will run away from you
Don't you run away, run away from me
I will run away from you
[Chorus 3]
Hit me like a man, love me like a woman
From the devil deep inside, can't you see what I'm wanting?
Some will give you hell, some will give you heaven
So hit me like a man, love me like a woman
Love me like a woman
Love me like a woman
Love me like a woman, ow!

tracks.title: Under the Water
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Lay my head under the water
Lay my head under the sea
Excuse me, sir, am I your daughter?
Won't you take me back, take me back and see?
There's not a time for being younger
And all my friends are enemies
And if I cried unto my mother
No, she wasn't there, she wasn't there for me
[Pre-Chorus]
Don't let the water drag you down (Don't let the water drag you down)
Don't let the water drag you down
[Verse 2]
Broken lines across my mirror
Show my face, all red and bruised
And though I screamed and I screamed
Well, no one came running
No, I wasn't saved, I wasn't safe from you
[Pre-Chorus]
Don't let the water drag you down (Don't let the water drag you down)
Don't let the water drag you down
[Chorus]
Don't let me drown, don't let me drown in the waves
And I, I could be found, I could be what you had saved
[Post-Chorus]
Saved
Saved
Saved
[Guitar Solo]
[Verse 3]
Lay my head under the water
Aloud, I pray for calmer seas
And when I wake from this dream
With chains all around me
No, I've never been, I've never been free
No, I've never been, I've never been free
No, I've never been, I've never been free

tracks.title: Since You're Gone
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Since you're high
Since you steal
Since you hate everything I feel
Since you cheat
Since you lie
Since you don't wanna try things I wanna try
[Chorus]
Since you've been gone
My life has moved along quite nicely actually
I've got a lot more friends and I don't have to pretend
Since you're gone, since you're gone
[Verse 2]
Since you're not what I want
You can take everything I've got
Take the seat, take the drive
If I say "I love you", I am a liar
[Chorus]
Since you been gone
My life has moved along quite nicely actually
Meet my lover Jen and I don't have to pretend
Since you're gone, since you're gone
[Post-Chorus]
Well, I've been looking for a new direction anyway
I've been looking for my own protection to save
[Bridge]
Now that you're gone my life has moved along
Now that you're gone my life has moved along
Now that you're gone my life has moved along
Now that you're gone
[Verse 3]
Since you're high
Since you steal
Since you hate everything I feel
Since you cheat
Since you lie
Since you don't wanna try things I wanna try
[Chorus]
Since you been gone
My life has moved along quite nicely actually
[Outro]
Quite nicely actually
Quite nicely actually
Quite nicely actually
Quite nicely actually
Quite nicely actually
(Thanks for asking)
Quite nicely

tracks.title: Cold Blooded
lyrics: [Chorus 1: Taylor Momsen]
You can't trust a cold-blooded man
Girl, don't believe in his lies
Can't trust a cold-blooded man
He'll love you and leave you alive
There's one thing you must understand
You can't trust a cold-blooded man
[Chorus 2: Ben Phillips]
Can't trust a cold-blooded woman
Boy, don't you lie in her bed
You can't trust a cold-blooded woman
She'll love you and leave you for dead
There's one thing you must understand
You can't trust a cold-blooded woman
[Bridge: Taylor Momsen & Ben Phillips]
And all the times I sit and wonder why I'm to blame, oh
And all the times that I'm reminded by, I'm ashamed, oh yeah
[Guitar Solo]
[Chorus 3: Taylor Momsen & Ben Phillips]
You can't trust a cold-blooded lover
You can't trust a cold-blooded slave
You can't trust a cold-blooded other
In the end they'll just drive you insane
There's one thing you must understand
You can't trust a cold-blooded
Can't trust a cold-blooded
Can't trust a cold-blooded
[Outro]
Woman (Man)
